title: Custom game issue
body:
I just can't launch custom game. I can create it but not launch.
(Error)> "We encountered an unexpected error trying to start your custom game."
Is there some way to do it? Or I need to download the old LOL Client?

replies.body: Weird. I've never heard of this specific error popping up. I just tested a custom game myself in case this was affecting everyone, but mine worked fine. Try creating and launching into another custom match after rebooting your computer and let me know if anything's changed. ^.^
